# bonds

Bonds overview. Market can be US or Global.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/bonds market
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| market | Market to display: `gl` for global `us` for US | False | us, gl |


---

## Examples

```
/bonds
```
